QuestData.Title: Spirit-Gathering Labor
QuestData.Description: You are not like the others.$b$bThe waters here carry deep power. Power most have forgotten. But the tirnenn forget very little.$b$bPower flows through the earth just as water flows with power. Flows can be trapped for a time, dripping. Drop by drop they drip into vessels.$b$bSearch for the vessels beneath the falls. Collect the power.
QuestData.RewardText: Much power courses through. We need only the smallest dustings. Your labors please me.
